title: Bookmarks toolbar disappeared this morning (I believe since updating to v92.0 64bit)
content:
Bookmarks toolbar disappeared this morning (I believe since updating to v92.0 64bit) Running Windows 7 64bit Tried View > Toolbars > Bookmarks Toolbar > Always Show = Nothing. Allocation of Toolbar space is shown and allocated but it is empty. Tried to sync now, still no luck.

Under Bookmarks button on the menu bar on top of Firefox > Bookmarks Toolbar and all its contents are there.

Please help.

SherabPuntsok
creator: sherabpuntsok

title: Looking to disable _automatic_ HTTP redirects
content:
Is there a way to prevent a website from automatically redirecting to a different URL? Note that I have found a method that seems to work, but it simply errors out when a website tries to redirect. I'd prefer to _see_ the URL the website is trying to redirect to, and have Firefox ask me for permission before going there.

Is this possible?
creator: jeff77

title: Version 91.0.2
content: How can I change back to version 91.0.2 from this last update. I do not like the way that favorite tabs are presented, too much space between, not helpful. I like to be able to look at my entire saved entries, not scrolling thru because they are so far apart.
creator: raj8

title: I just upgraded to 91.0.2, and my bookmarks are gone, how do I recover them?
content: I just upgraded to 91.0.2, and my bookmarks are gone, how do I recover them?
creator: mrkensrinindy
